text: "When I was 14 years old and being molested, I didn't really understand what anybody else was going through. It was mainly about me and what I was going through. That was my world," Eggert told the Daily News after Polinsky stepped forward. "So all these years (later), to be able to have these open conversations with other cast mates and with Alex in particular, it really brings up a lot of feelings, and I realize, 'No, I didn't stick up for him.' And I wish I could have."
title: Scott Baio won’t face charges for allegedly molesting Nicole Eggert on ‘Charles in Charge’

meta_data.description: Charles in Charge won’t be charged.
